{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"それは、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"orange"},"plain_text":"CLI","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":" と ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"orange"},"plain_text":"GUI ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"です。CUIは ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Command Line Interface","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"、GUIは  ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Graphical User Interface ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の略です。（覚えなくても大丈夫ですよ。）","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"CLIの基礎","href":"/posts/curriculums/1bea501e-f337-804c-90e8-da6f1f5384c1/1bea501e-f337-804c-90e8-da6f1f5384c1","mention":{"type":"prossedPage","content":{"iconUrl":"https://www.notion.so/icons/keyboard_lightgray.svg","iconType":"external","title":"CLIの基礎"}}},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":" でもやりましたね。CLI (Command Line Interface) は、パソコンを文字だけで操作する方法です。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"また、これまでPythonで使用していた","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"print","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"関数や","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"input","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"関数も、文字のみの出力と入力しか扱っていないのでCLIといえます。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"このCLIを使用したプログラム・アプリは、作成が簡単、動作が軽量などといったメリットがあります。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"でも、見た目もパッとしないし、なにより慣れている人でないとCLIを使用したアプリを使いこなすことは難しいでしょう。","href":null}]}
